decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (OW/HP 15 3 03, OW/HP 15 3 04, OW/HP 15 3 05, OW/HP 15 3 06, OW/HP 15 3 09 A, OW/HP 15 3 10 A, OW/HP 15 3 11,  OW/HP 15 3 12, OW/HP 15 3 13, OW/HP 15 3 14, OW/HP 15 3 15, OW/HP 15 3 16, OW/HP 15 3 17, OW/HP 15 3 18 A, OW/HP 15 3 19 A, Site/Location Plan. Received: 10/11/2016. Unnumbered location plan (5 Herbert Place), Unnumbered location plan (6 Herbert Place) Design and Access Statement (5 Herbert Place) dated November 2016, Design and Access Statement (6 Herbert Place) dated November 2016. Received: 15/11/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the flank walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - "Before the development hereby permitted commences the applicant must either:
a.	Investigate the site for landfill gas to the satisfaction of the LPA, to ascertain whether gas protection measures are required.  Where measures are required the details shall be submitted to, and approved by, the LPA.
Or;
b.	The applicant shall install gas protection measures as a precautionary measure without first investigating the site.  The details of these measures shall be submitted to, and approved by, the LPA.
c.	For a. and b. all required measures shall be installed before the development is first occupied.
description: Erection of front and rear roof extensions and single storey rear extensions to both properties and a single storey side extension to no 6
